name: Gorilla Finance
additional_notices: No active trades are found for this coin. Please submit a ticket at %{link} if you think this is an error.

description.en: Gorilla Finance is a decentralized trading strategy platform that is already live on  BSC, further will be deployed on multi chain as well. Gorilla services financial strategists and amateur traders. The financial experts, to gain more profit, can upload their trading strategy to the platform. Meanwhile, they get a share of the profits from uploading their trading strategies. Amateur traders lack high-quality trading strategies to achieve profits. So, Gorilla provides them professional strategies to arbitrage among different DEX exchanges, maximize funds, and gain consistent profits.
